home_title2: Chinese Language Understanding and Generation Evaluation benchmark.
home_titledetail: Zhiyuan Index includes high-quality Chinese natural language processing data sets, rankings and online evaluation platforms, which aims to build a comprehensive and systematic Chinese machine language ability evaluation system, form a multi-level dimension evaluation program, and also trive to promote the standard evaluation of Chinese natural language processing technology in a more scientific, standardized, and high-quality manner.

faq_content.title: How to participate in the Zhiyuan Index evaluation
details: Download all data sets with one click on the introduction page of the Zhiyuan Index framework, or download a specific data set on the data download page.
Generate the prediction result file of the test set. The prediction result file format is the same as the training set.

The prediction result files are organized according to the folder structure of "ability-task-data set" (the data set downloaded with one click on the introduction page of the Zhiyuan Index framework has been organized according to this structure) and compressed into a zip format. After logging in to your personal account, you can submit it on the evaluation page.

faq_content.title: What norms need to be followed to participate in the evaluation?
details: Any form of using test set label information in model training and submission results are prohibited, including manually labeling test set labels by ourselves.
Share papers/technical reports/model codes  by review participants to jointly promote the active and healthy development of the natural language processing community are encouraged.

faq_content.title: How to download the dataset?
details: All data sets can be downloaded with one click on the introduction page of the Zhiyuan Index task framework.
You can download a specific data set in the data set list.

faq_content.title: What is the data usage license of Zhiyuan Index?
details: The data provided by Zhiyuan Index is for personal research purposes only, and commercial use is prohibited.

faq_content.title: How to give feedback on the Zhiyuan Index?
details: The Zhiyuan index system and evaluation platform are still under continuous construction and improvement. We will open a user feedback forum in the Zhiyuan community  in the future.

submit_hint: Please make sure that you are submitting your prediction files with the structure of ability->task->dataset.
submit_wlj: I understand that manual labeling of test set labels cannot be used in the model training process and submission results
forget_hint: 请输入您的邮箱，您将会收到一份带有指示的邮件。
